title: "ModelOp helps enterprises deploy, monitor, and maintain AI models"
excerpt: "ModelOp, a startup developing AI software and development services for enterprises, today announced that it has raised $6 million. It plans to use the capital to support demand for its products in a market that IDC anticipates will be worth $8 billion by 2022. The term ModelOps refers to the process of cycling analytical models from data ..."
